title: Magnitude of frictional force on block pulled

content.question: A block of mass m is pulled across a rough surface, as shown above. The coefficient of friction between the block and the surface is Âµğ‘˜ . The force F that pulls the block is exerted at the angle ğœ™ shown. Which of the following is an expression for the magnitude of the frictional force on the block if it is moving at constant speed?

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
